goal.name: No Poverty
goal.full_title: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
goal.description: Goal 1 calls for an end to poverty in all its manifestations by 2030. It also aims to ensure social protection for the poor and vulnerable, increase access to basic services and support people harmed by climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Zero Hunger
goal.full_title: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture
goal.description: Goal 2 seeks to end hunger and all forms of malnutrition by 2030. It commits to universal access to safe, nutritious and sufficient food, and to double agricultural productivity and incomes of small-scale food producers.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Good Health and Well-being
goal.full_title: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
goal.description: Goal 3 aims to ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages. It addresses all major health priorities, including reproductive, maternal and child health; communicable, non-communicable and environmental diseases; universal health coverage; and access to medicines and vaccines.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Quality Education
goal.full_title: Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
goal.description: Goal 4 aims to ensure inclusive and equitable quality education at all levels. It focuses on access to early childhood development, free primary and secondary education, affordable vocational training, and eliminating gender and wealth disparities.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Gender Equality
goal.full_title: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
goal.description: Goal 5 aims to achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls. It targets ending all forms of discrimination and violence against women, eliminating harmful practices, ensuring equal participation in leadership, and providing universal access to reproductive rights.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Clean Water and Sanitation
goal.full_title: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
goal.description: Goal 6 focuses on ensuring availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all. It addresses safe drinking water, sanitation, hygiene, water quality, water-use efficiency, integrated water resources management, and protecting water-related ecosystems.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Affordable and Clean Energy
goal.full_title: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all
goal.description: Goal 7 aims to ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy for all. It focuses on universal access to electricity and clean cooking fuels, increasing the share of renewable energy, improving energy efficiency, and enhancing international cooperation on clean energy research.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Decent Work and Economic Growth
goal.full_title: Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all
goal.description: Goal 8 promotes sustained, inclusive economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all. It addresses GDP growth, economic productivity, job creation, entrepreneurship, labor rights, safe working environments, and sustainable tourism.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
goal.full_title: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
goal.description: Goal 9 focuses on building resilient infrastructure, promoting inclusive and sustainable industrialization and fostering innovation. It addresses quality infrastructure, sustainable industrialization, access to financial services for small enterprises, technological capabilities, and research and development.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Reduced Inequalities
goal.full_title: Reduce inequality within and among countries
goal.description: Goal 10 addresses reducing inequality within and among countries. It focuses on income growth for the bottom 40%, social, economic and political inclusion, equal opportunity, reduced inequalities of outcome, safe migration, and improved representation for developing countries in global institutions.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Sustainable Cities and Communities
goal.full_title: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
goal.description: Goal 11 aims to make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable. It addresses housing, transport systems, urbanization planning, cultural and natural heritage, disaster impacts, environmental impacts of cities, and access to green and public spaces.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Responsible Consumption and Production
goal.full_title: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
goal.description: Goal 12 focuses on ensuring sustainable consumption and production patterns. It addresses sustainable management of natural resources, food waste reduction, chemicals and waste management, sustainable practices by companies, sustainable public procurement, and sustainable lifestyles.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Climate Action
goal.full_title: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
goal.description: Goal 13 calls for urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts. It focuses on strengthening resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards, integrating climate change measures into national policies, improving education and awareness on climate change mitigation and adaptation.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Life Below Water
goal.full_title: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development
goal.description: Goal 14 focuses on conserving and sustainably using the oceans, seas and marine resources. It addresses marine pollution, ocean acidification, overfishing, marine protected areas, and the sustainable use of marine resources by small island developing states and least developed countries.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Life on Land
goal.full_title: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
goal.description: Goal 15 focuses on protecting, restoring and promoting sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, managing forests sustainably, combating desertification, halting and reversing land degradation, and halting biodiversity loss.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
goal.full_title: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
goal.description: Goal 16 promotes peaceful and inclusive societies, provides access to justice for all and builds effective, accountable and inclusive institutions. It addresses violence, abuse, trafficking, rule of law, illicit financial flows, corruption, transparent institutions, and inclusive decision-making.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

goal.name: Partnerships for the Goals
goal.full_title: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development
goal.description: Goal 17 focuses on strengthening the means of implementation and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development. It addresses finance, technology, capacity-building, trade, policy coherence, partnerships, and data monitoring and accountability.

reference.source_context: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Framework

sources.source_name: Global Earthquakes (USGS + NOAA Significant)
sources.llm_summary: 19,132 earthquake events magnitude 5.0+ worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes depth, felt radius, and impact data where available.

sources.source_name: Global Flood Database + Dartmouth Flood Observatory
sources.llm_summary: 610 flood events worldwide, 2015-2019. Includes flood extent, duration, severity, deaths, and displacement data. Source data ends in 2019.

sources.source_name: IBTrACS - International Best Track Archive
sources.llm_summary: 1,177 tropical storms/hurricanes/typhoons worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes track positions with wind speed, pressure, and wind radii data.

sources.source_name: Global Tornadoes (NOAA + Canada)
sources.llm_summary: 17,338 tornado events in USA and Canada, 2015-2025. Includes EF-scale ratings, track endpoints, path width, and damage data.

sources.source_name: NOAA NCEI Global Historical Tsunami Database
sources.llm_summary: 193 tsunami events worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes triggering earthquake magnitude, water height, and intensity data.

sources.source_name: Smithsonian Global Volcanism Program + NOAA Significant Eruptions
sources.llm_summary: 383 volcanic eruption events worldwide, 2015-2025. Includes VEI ratings, eruption agents, and impact data from NOAA significant eruptions.

sources.source_name: Global Fire Atlas
sources.llm_summary: 11,235 wildfire events 200+ km2 worldwide (excluding USA/Canada), 2014-2024. Derived from MODIS burned area product.
